chapter.text: By the scattering (winds) that scatters
and by the carriers of a heavy load (of rain)
and by the (ships) sailing with ease
and by the distributor of affair (the angels)
what you are promised is certainly true
and the judgment is certainly a reality
And by the sky having pathways (and orbits)
indeed you are of different opinion
Anyone who is deviated, he is deviated from it (Quran and the truth)
Death to the liars (and conjecturers)
Those who are neglectful in a flood (of ignorance)
They ask: when is the judgment day
A day that they are tortured over the fire
Taste (the result of) your trial, this is what you used to want it in a hurry
Indeed those who control themselves are in gardens and springs
Taking what their Master gave them. Indeed they were good doers before this
They used to sleep a little of the night
and they ask forgiveness by the dawns
and there was a (portion) in their wealth due for the beggars and the disadvantaged
And there are signs for those who are certain on the earth
and in yourselves. Do you not see
And your provision and what you are promised is in the sky
By the Master of the skies and the earth, it is certainly true, same as (it is true that) you speak
Did the story of the noble guests of Abraham reach you
When they entered upon him and they said: peace (and well-being). He said: peace (and well-being) strangers
Then he went to his family and brought a fat (roasted) calf
Then he placed it close to them saying: do you not eat
Then he felt afraid of them, they said: do not be afraid. And they gave him good news of a knowledgeable son
Then his wife came forward screaming, striking her face, and she said: I am an infertile old woman
They said: that is what your Master said, indeed He is the wise, the knowledgeable
He said: you messengers, so what is your business
They said: we were sent to a group of guilty ones
so that we send upon them stones of clay
marked by your Master for the excessive ones
So We brought out anyone who was among the believers in it
But We only found a house of the submitted ones in it
And We left a sign in it for those who fear the painful punishment
And in (the story of) Moses when We sent him to Pharaoh with a clear authorization
Then he turned away with his base (of supporters) and said: a magician or a madman
So We took him and his troops, then We threw them in the sea, and he was to blame
And in (the story of) Aad when We sent upon them the destructive wind
It did not leave anything that it came upon it, except making it as the decomposed thing
And (the story of) Thamud when they were told: enjoy yourselves for a while
Then they rebelled against their Masterâ€™s command, so the thunderbolt took them while they were looking
Then they could not stand up and they could not take revenge (or defend)
And people of Noah in the past, indeed they were disobedient people
We built the sky with Our power and We are certainly expanding (it)
And We spread out the earth, and how good We spread out
And We created pairs of everything, so you may take notice
So run away to God. Indeed I am a clear warner for you from Him
And do not set up another god with God. Indeed I am a clear warner for you from Him
Likewise, no messenger came to those before them unless they said: a magician or a madman
Did they recommend (one another) to it? No, they are rebellious people
So turn away from them, you are not to blame
And (continue to) remind, as indeed the reminder benefits the believers
And I did not create Jinn and humans except to serve Me (and no one else)
I do not want any provision from them and I do not want them to feed Me
Indeed God is the provider having the power and the definitive strength
So indeed there are shares (of punishment) for those who did wrong same as shares of their companions, so they should not ask Me to rush
So woe to those who disbelieved from their day that they are promised
